metadata.title: CVE-2017-18236 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Exempi before 2.4.4. TheASF_Support::ReadHeaderObject function inXMPFiles/source/FormatSupport/ASF_Support.cpp allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted .asf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18236` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.4.5-2
libexempi3 - 2.4.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.5-2').
